label: cascading_failure_01_dx_auth_audit_006
content:

### Deployments & Changes

- Fixed 17 recurring SAML assertion errors by correcting NameID format on two partner apps.

### Events
- Confirmed removal of 160 roles tied to offboarded contractors; reconciled with HR feed.
- Fixed 17 recurring SAML assertion errors.
- Validated token rotation success after prior day tuning; failures down to 20.
